mapper.select: select * from cment where c_tbno = 'teamblog' and c_tbset = ${c_no} order by c_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into cment( c_no, c_c_id, c_m_thum, c_tbno, c_tbset, c_content, c_date )values( cmt_seq.NEXTVAL, #{c_c_id}, (select m_thum from member where m_id = #{c_c_id}), 'teamblog', #{c_no}, #{c_content}, sysdate )
